parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent or complete failure of the windshield wipers can severely reduce driver visibility, especially during rain or snow, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: windshield wipers stop working during use
windshield wipers do not turn on at all
windshield wipers activate on their own while the switch is in the off position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat back recliner mechanism can cause the seat back to fall back, potentially leading to accidents or injuries, especially in the event of sudden stops or crashes.
symptoms: The seat back recliner mechanism bolts break
the high bucket seatback rocks back and forth on the seat track and anchor
